Desc.entry: Private dual registered nursing and residential home with an Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI) facility. 71 beds. Organises day trips in August and October, a summer fete in September and a pantomime in December. Run by Palms Row. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

Langs.entry: British Sign Language, French, Polish, Urdu

ContactName.entry: Marcella Wilkinson, Matron & Manager/Rhona Cheetham, Deputy Matron

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
CARE HOMES WITH NURSING FOR OLDER PEOPLE (NURSING HOMES)
